item.description:
A Converstation About Sexual Orientation and Religion

"For Religion Tells Me So, or Does It . . . ?"

 

sponsored by UMass Lowell Pride Alliance

Saturday October 15, 2011

9 am to 1:30 pm

registration starts @ 8:45am

Pre-Register@UMLTickets.com by October 8th

UML Students and Faculty $5, Non UML $10

Registration @ Door UML $8, Non UML $13

Includes Lunch

 

 

Events include:

~For the Bible Tells Me So - Award winning Documentary Film

~Film and Discussion

~Interfaith panel of Religious Leaders (Ryuoh Shonin is on the panel)

~Ideas and Activities to continue the conversation

 

FYI - This is not a Temple sponsered event. Ryuoh Shonin will be attending the event as a participant in the Interfaith Panel Discussion. No RSVP on this meetup necessary. Please register with UML or get tickets at the door.

If you have questions please contact Ryuoh Shonin or the UML Pride Alliance.
item.name: A conversation about Sexual Orientation and Religion
